<Text: The Mystery of the Yellow Room (1919 film):  "The Mystery of the Yellow Room" (in French "Le mystère de la chambre jaune") was first a novel by Gaston Leroux.>

Text: The Mystery of the Yellow Room (1919 film):  It was first published in France in the periodical "L'Illustration" from September 1907 to November 1907, then in its own right as a book in 1908.
